abilities.name: ROTERSTERN
abilities.description: Fire explosive rounds with his blaster, Roterstern, damaging the target hit and enemies behind them.
abilities.casting: Straight-line projectile that generates a spell field upon impact
abilities.damage_falloff: Falloff begins at 20m, decreasing to 60% at 40m
abilities.range: Cone-shaped spell field with a 5m radius and an apex angle of 90°
abilities.details: Enemies that take damage from the projectile will no longer receive damage from the spell field

abilities.name: BIONIC HOOK
abilities.description: Charge up and launch a hook with his bionic arm, reeling in the first target hit and enemies lurking behind
abilities.casting: Straight-line projectile that generates a spell field upon impact
abilities.range: The projectile can travel up to 10m with a 0.5s charge. As the charge time increases, it can reach a maximum distance of 20m with a 1s charge

abilities.name: TROOPER'S FIST
abilities.description: Dash forward, seizing enemies along the path and launching up enemies at the end of the dash
abilities.details: The dash can hit multiple targets if they're very close to each other, leading them perfectly into the uppercut. Maximum Distance: 9m. Average Speed: 30 m/s

abilities.name: TAINTED VOLTAGE
abilities.description: Charge up and launch a powerful electrical punch with the bionic arm in the target direction, dealing damage to enemies within range and Slowing them. This ability can Knock Down flying heroes
abilities.casting: Projectile that fires in a straight trajectory
abilities.details: Projectiles pierce through enemies. Slow Rate: -35%, Slow Duration: 2s

abilities.name: CEASELESS CHARGE
abilities.description: Roterstern reloads automatically while the bionic arm is in action, granting Bonus Health to the Winter Soldier
abilities.details: BONUS HEALTH (SELF) - 40 (Bionic Hook & Tainted Voltage), 50 (Trooper's Fist, Kraken Impact), 30 (Stellar Impact)

ultimate.name: KRAKEN IMPACT
ultimate.description: Leap high, then dash forward and slam down with the bionic arm, dealing damage to enemies in range, marking them for Culling. Marked enemies will perish instantly if their health falls below a certain threshold, recharging the bionic arm for another Kraken Impact within a short period
ultimate.details: NEXT KRAKEN IMPACT AFTER A CULLING - 8s. Enemies that have 15% of their maximum HP or below have a unique marker above their health bar when Kraken Impact is activated, indicating that they can be KO'd instantly if they are struck by the ultimate. Additionally, the ultimate can be refreshed if a teammate defeats an enemy marked with Culling. This reset works even against Loki's Doppelgangers, Hulk reverting to Bruce Banner, or when triggering Wolverine's Regenerative Healing Factor.

gameplay.strategy_overview:
Overall Playstyle:

Winter Soldier is an aggressive, precise Duelist known for high burst damage and significant crowd control. His primary, Roterstern (LMB), fires explosive rounds (3 per mag) damaging the initial target and splashing behind them. Bionic Hook (RMB) pulls the first enemy hit (and nearby enemies behind them) towards him (range increased by charging). Trooper's Fist (Shift) dashes forward, seizing enemies and launching them with an uppercut. Tainted Voltage (E - 2 charges S2) is a piercing electrical projectile that damages, slows, and knocks down airborne opponents.

Position behind Vanguards, capitalizing on space created, and near Strategists for protection against flankers. His ultimate, Kraken Impact (Q), involves a leap and slam, applying a 'Culling' mark (insta-execute below health threshold, resets ult cooldown on successful cull). His passive, Ceaseless Charge, auto-reloads Roterstern and grants bonus health when using bionic arm abilities. Weave bionic arm abilities between Roterstern shots for ammo and health sustain.



Key Combos & Ability Usage:
  • Basic Kill Combo:
    Bionic Hook (RMB) to pull enemy → Immediately Trooper's Fist (Shift) to dash through and launch → Finish with Roterstern (LMB) shots.

  • Anti-Air Combo:
    Enemy airborne → Use Tainted Voltage (E) to knock them down → Quickly fire Roterstern (LMB) shots while they are grounded.

  • Ultimate Chain Combo (Kraken Impact - Q):
    Identify a low-health target → Use Kraken Impact (Q) to leap, slam, and apply Culling mark → Immediately use Roterstern (LMB) to confirm kill and reset ult cooldown. Repeat on other low-health targets.

  • Displacement Combo:
    Bionic Hook (RMB) to pull an enemy out of position → Immediately Trooper's Fist (Shift) to push them further towards your team or away from theirs.

  • Mid-Range Harass:
    Use Tainted Voltage (E) to slow a retreating enemy → Follow with accurate Roterstern (LMB) shots.

Matchup Considerations:
  • Favorable Against: Squishy Duelists and Strategists (high burst, CC isolates them). Flying heroes (Tainted Voltage knocks down). Tanks without strong shields/mobility (Bionic Hook displaces, abilities hinder).

  • Challenging Against: Long-range, high-damage hitscan (e.g., Hela, Hawkeye) who outrange him. Heroes with strong shields/invulnerability. Agile Duelists with good tracking (e.g., Spider-Man) can be hard to hit consistently. Namor's multiple Monstro spawns can overwhelm.

  • Key Synergies: Team-Up with Captain America (Stars Aligned) grants Stellar Impact (leap to ally, AoE damage) improving mobility and engagement, plus a powerful clash attack.

Core Strengths:
  • High Burst Damage: Can quickly eliminate vulnerable targets with ability sequences and Roterstern.
  • Strong Crowd Control Suite: Bionic Hook (RMB - pull), Trooper's Fist (Shift - launch), Tainted Voltage (E - slow/knockdown) provide versatile disruption.
  • Kill-Chaining Ultimate: Kraken Impact (Q) can reset on successful culls, enabling multi-kills.
  • Sustain via Passive: Ceaseless Charge auto-reloads weapon and grants bonus health on bionic arm ability use.
  • Effective Anti-Air: Tainted Voltage (E) reliably grounds flying opponents.
  • Good Displacement: Abilities can pull enemies out of position or push them into unfavorable spots.
  • Enhanced Utility (S2): Two charges of Tainted Voltage (E) allow for more frequent use.
  • Powerful Team-Up: Synergy with Captain America significantly boosts mobility and AoE damage.
weaknesses: Has limited mobility outside of his Ultimate and a Short dash.
Winter Soldier is very reliant on his bionic-arm abilities to keep damage going; if he mismanages them, he can be left incredibly vulnerable with his gun relying on them.
The Culling debuff from Kraken Impact lasts for only 5 seconds, making strong defensive abilities like Barrier and Soul Bond to be effective counters.

achievements.name: Brothers in Arms
achievements.description: As Winter Soldier, land 1 KO with an assist from Rocket Raccoon.

achievements.name: Arm Race
achievements.description: As Winter Soldier, land 3 KOs with a single use of Kraken Impact.

lore_details.ingame_bio_quote: "I'm not anyone's sidekick, what I do best is done alone."
lore_details.ingame_bio_text: Terrifying experiments turned him into a brainwashed assassin, but now James Buchanan "Bucky" Barnes is in control of his own fate once again. With his enhanced mechanical arm, the Winter Soldier is primed to deliver earth-shattering blows to any foe in his path!

hero_stories.title: A Helping Hand
hero_stories.content:
The news streamed in from all over the world. The people in charge were calling it the Timestream Entanglement — a sudden disruption in the fabric of space and time that had sent chaos rippling across countless realities. The heroes of Earth had assembled to face the crisis head on. Not all of them had survived.

...

Moments later, in a crackle of energy, the heroes stepped out of the portal. They weren't anywhere near Hydra's frozen base. That was instantly clear. In fact, it didn't even look like they were on Earth anymore. The strange chronal energies of the Timestream Entanglement ripped across a star-filled sky as they gazed in disbelief at the spaceport of a futuristic city. If this was Wakanda, it certainly wasn't the one that Bucky and Clint knew.

changes: Winter Soldier was released as the 24th character to be introduced to Marvel Rivals as a Duelist hero.
Added 2 new costumes: Navy Trooper and Revolution.
Added the Arm Race achievement.
Added to the Ammo Overload Team-Up Ability with Rocket Raccoon and The Punisher.
When the target area is ascending or descending, if Winter Soldier hit an enemy with his Ultimate and they landed right on the target area platform, damage may be lost. This issue has been resolved.
After using his ultimate, the Winter Soldier's movement speed issues upon respawn have been fixed. He's back to full combat readiness!
Fixed occassional incorrect resets of Winter Soldier's ultimate ability.
Fixed an issue where the Winter Soldier's ultimate ability would sometimes fail to hit targets within its range.

balance_changes.date_version: 25/01/10: Version 20250110 / Season 1: Eternal Night Falls Launch
changes: Increase the bonus health provided by Bionic Hook and Tainted Voltage from 30 to 40.
Increase Roterstern's projectile damage from 70 to 75.
Reduce the area damage from 70 to 65 and reduce damage decay from 65% at 40 meters to 60%.
Increase base health from 250 to 275.
Addressed an issue where if Winter Soldier used his ultimate ability to defeat a shapeshifted Loki, it wouldn't count towards the ultimate ability consecutive KO achievement.
Added 1 new costume: Blood Soldier.
Addressed an issue where Winter Soldier's ultimate sometimes visually appeared to hit targets but would actually miss. The sharpshooter's aim is now spot on!

Resolved a bug where the Winter Soldier's Tainted Voltage automatic reload could fail to trigger after firing and immediately using his Trooper's Fist ability. Bucky's firepower is now as relentless as his mission for justice!

Fixed an issue where if the Winter Soldier used Bionic Hook during the slow-motion match over moment, it could cause abnormal arm model display in the next round. Now, Bucky's got his look--and his lethal arm--back on point!

Addressed an issue where Bucky would sometimes descend before ascending while unleashing his Ultimate Ability in unstable network conditions. Now, the Winter Soldier rises to the occasion without any time-traveling hiccups--no need for a Doctor Strange intervention!
Increase the cooldown time for Bionic Hook from 8 seconds to 12 seconds.
Reduce base damage of Kraken Impact from 100 to 80 and lower the culling threshold from 20% of maximum health to 15%.
Added to the Stars Aligned Team-Up Ability with Captain America, but removed from the Ammo Overload Team-Up Ability with Rocket Raccoon and The Punisher.
Added 1 new costume color for Blood Soldier: Winter's Wrath.
Adjust the Tainted Voltage ability to have 2 charge levels, while keeping the cooldown time unchanged.
Upon leaping to a teammate, Stellar Impact will provide 50 Bonus Health to allies within range.
Added 1 new costume: Thunderbolts*.

lore_details.official_quote: "I was rebuilt to be a weapon, but now I'm the one who pulls the trigger."
lore_details.official_description: Winter Soldier is a Duelist hero in Marvel Rivals, and is the 24th hero introduced to the game's roster. He has a team-up ability that work in conjunction with Captain America.

lore_powers_skills: Enhanced physical conditioning through genetic manipulation
Bionic left arm that grants superhuman strength, multipurpose weaponry, and extendable tendrils
